title: Back from Hong Kong AMA
body: Just spent a week in Hong Kong. Ask me anything.

replies.body: What did you do this week?

> [{quoted}](name=Nature,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=sQEGXOvK,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2014-12-09T10:42:53.664+0000)
> What did you do this week?

Went shopping. Went to horse races. Dined in a private function room at the Ritz Carlton.
Sounds like you are rich o.O

> Did you see any Riot?

Actually yes. I had to go to central a lot so saw a lot of it. Was pretty intense, but I knew people who were involved directly so made it even worse.

> pics?
Here's me at Shatin Race Course. I won a lot of money that day! I was also in the members section.
